definition: to approach (a numerical value)/to converge to a limit (in calculus)/convergence
to hasten/to hurry/to walk fast/to approach/to tend towards/to converge

sentences.english: Wages in eastern Germany have also edged up towards western levels.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，德東的人均收入水平已經趨近德西。

sentences.english: This paper presents a variable rate reaching law for discrete variable structure system based on the attenuating control.
sentences.chinese: 提出離散變結構控制系統基於衰減控制的變速趨近律。

definition: progress step by step/gradual progress/to move forward (slowly)
to advance gradually and entrench oneself at every step/to consolidate at every step
to turn a blind eye to
in an instant a myriad changes (idiom); rapid substantial change
the feeling that sth is genuine/sense of reality/in the flesh
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
